summary.span: 这是与相应的 COM 对象的互操作性的托管代码需要 COM coclass 中的主接口。

span.span: This is a primary interface in a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

summary.span: 仅当您想要使用的方法共享相同的名称的 COM 对象; 事件时，才使用此主接口在这种情况下，强制转换为此接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，使用.NET 接口派生自 COM coclass 访问方法、 属性和事件的 COM 对象。

span.span: Otherwise, use the .NET interface that is derived from the COM coclass to access methods, properties, and events of the COM object.

summary.span: 有关 COM 对象的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the COM object, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowMultipleSelection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 确定是否可在选择姓名对话框中一次选择多个地址条目。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that determines whether more than one address entry can be selected at a time in the Select Names dialog.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: AllowMultipleSelection 的默认值是 True。如果将 AllowMultipleSelection 设置为 True，用户可以使用 ctrl 键或 SHIFT键来选择多个收件人。如果将 AllowMultipleSelection 设置为 False，禁用多个选定内容。

span.span: The default value of AllowMultipleSelection is True. If AllowMultipleSelection is set to True, the user can select multiple recipients by using the CTRL or SHIFT key. If AllowMultipleSelection is set to False, multiple selection is disabled.

para.span: 将 AllowMultipleSelection 设置为 False不能保证，只能有一个收件人可以选择。

span.span: Setting AllowMultipleSelection to False does not ensure that only one recipient can be selected.

para.span: 用户可以直接从收件人列表中的选择的编辑框中多次重复键入其他收件人。

span.span: The user can type additional recipients in the edit box or select from the recipient list multiple times.

para.span: 若要确保该仅有一个收件人的可选择在对话框中，将设置为False AllowMultipleSelect和到olShowNone。

span.span: To ensure that only one recipient can be selected in the dialog, set AllowMultipleSelect to False and to olShowNone.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回对象，表示父应用程序 (Outlook)对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent application (Outlook) for the object.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BccLabel { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置在选择姓名对话框的密件抄送命令按钮上显示的文本字符串（C# 中的字符串）。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) for the text that appears on the Bcc command button on the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 若要提供的收件人编辑框的加速键，包括与号 (&) 在标签参数字符串作为访问键的字符前面的字符。

span.span: To provide an accelerator key for the recipient edit boxes, include an ampersand (&) character in the label argument string, immediately before the character that serves as the access key.

para.span: 例如，如果BccLabel是字符串"本地&与会者"，用户可以按 ALT + A 将焦点移到第一个收件人编辑框。

span.span: For example, if BccLabel is the string "Local &Attendees", users can press ALT+A to move the focus to the first recipient edit box.

para.span: 如果未设置BccLabel ，则默认值将"密件抄送"的本地化的字符串。

span.span: If BccLabel is not set, then the default value will be the localized string for "Bcc".

para.span: 如果BccLabel设置为空字符串，则将显示密件抄送命令按钮的>。

span.span: If the BccLabel is set to an empty string, then the Bcc command button shows ->.

para.span: 如果BccLabel属性将包含超过 32 个字符 (包括与号 (&) 访问键)，将命令按钮中显示仅前 32 个字符。

span.span: If the BccLabel property contains more than 32 characters (including the ampersand (&) access key), only the first 32 characters will be displayed in the command button.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值代表选择姓名对话框的标题的字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) value that represents the title for the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 如果您没有设置 标题 ，对话框的标题将 选择姓名或本地化的等效项。如果您将 标题 设置为空字符串，则将空字符串对话框框标题。

span.span: If you do not set Caption, the title of the dialog box will be Select Names or the localized equivalent. If you set Caption to an empty string, the dialog box caption will be an empty string.

para.span: 将 标题 设置为长字符串 (例如，300 个字符) 会使标题被截断，而不会更改 选择姓名对话框的宽度。

span.span: Setting the Caption to a long string (for example, 300 characters) will cause the caption to be truncated, and will not cause the width of the Select Names dialog to change.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CcLabel { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置在选择姓名对话框的抄送命令按钮上显示的文本字符串（C# 中的字符串）。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) for the text that appears on the Cc command button on the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 若要提供的收件人编辑框的加速键，包括与号 (&) 在标签参数字符串作为访问键的字符前面的字符。

span.span: To provide an accelerator key for the recipient edit boxes, include an ampersand (&) character in the label argument string, immediately before the character that serves as the access key.

para.span: 例如，如果CcLabel是字符串"本地&与会者"，用户可以按 ALT + A 将焦点移到第一个收件人编辑框。

span.span: For example, if CcLabel is the string "Local &Attendees", users can press ALT+A to move the focus to the first recipient edit box.

para.span: 如果未设置CcLabel ，则默认值将"抄送"的本地化的字符串。

span.span: If CcLabel is not set, then the default value will be the localized string for "Cc".

para.span: 如果CcLabel设置为空字符串，则将显示抄送命令按钮的>。

span.span: If the CcLabel is set to an empty string, then the Cc command button shows ->.

para.span: 如果CcLabel属性包含超过 32 个字符 (包括与号 (&) 访问键)，将命令按钮中显示仅前 32 个字符。

span.span: If the CcLabel property contains more than 32 characters (including the ampersand (&) access key), only the first 32 characters will be displayed in the command button.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Class As OlObjectClass

summary.span: 返回中的一个常量指示的类枚举对象。

span.span: Returns a constant in the enumeration indicating the class of the object.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Display() runtime managed

summary.span: 显示选择姓名对话框。

span.span: Displays the Select Names dialog box.

returns.span: 一个布尔(C# 中bool ) 值，该值为True ，如果用户已单击确定，和False ，如果用户单击了取消或关闭图标。

span.span: A Boolean value (bool in C#) that is True if the user has clicked OK, and False if the user has clicked Cancel or the close icon.

para.span: 当显示 选择姓名对话框中， 显示 使用以前的位置和大小 (由顶部、 左侧、 宽度和高度) 对话框。

span.span: When displaying the Select Names dialog box, Display uses the previous location and size (indicated by the top, left, width, and height) of the dialog box.

para.span: "选择名称"对话框是一个模式对话框，这意味着在用户单击 "确定"、 "取消"或"关闭"图标之前代码执行将一直暂停。

span.span: The Select Names dialog box is modal, meaning that code execution will halt until the user clicks OK, Cancel, or the close icon.

para.span: 您应该对错误条件（包括内存不足或者打开了其他消息框或对话框）进行检测。

span.span: You should detect for error conditions that include insufficient memory or another message or dialog box is open.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ForceResolution { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 确定 Outlook 是否必须解析中指定的对象的所有收件人用户可以单击确定接受选择姓名对话框中的键入或所选收件人之前。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that determines if Outlook must resolve all recipients in the object specified by before the user can click OK to accept the typed or selected recipients in the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

para.span: 如果收件人不能解析，Outlook 将提示用户解决不明确的名称。

span.span: If a recipient cannot be resolved, Outlook will prompt the user to resolve the ambiguous names.

para.span: 用户必须具有所有收件人在收件人编辑框，可单击 确定之前解决。

span.span: The user must have all recipients in the recipient edit box resolved before being able to click OK.

para.span: 如果用户单击 取消或关闭图标，则 ForceResolution 将被忽略。

span.span: ForceResolution is ignored if the user clicks Cancel or the Close icon.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::AddressList ^ InitialAddressList { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::AddressList ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::AddressList ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置确定要显示在选择姓名对话框的初始地址列表的对象。

span.span: Returns or sets an object that determines the initial address list to be displayed in the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 设置InitialAddressList属性是在编程上等同于在选择姓名对话框中的通讯簿从下拉列表选择AddressList 。

span.span: Setting the InitialAddressList property is the programmatic equivalent to selecting an AddressList from the drop-down list for Address Book in the Select Names dialog box.

para.span: 在其默认状态， InitialAddressList是具有属性AddressList 将设置为True。

span.span: In its default state, InitialAddressList is the AddressList that has the property set to True.

para.span: IsInitialAddressList相当于设置的显示此地址列表首先在设置地址对话框，其中，可通过单击工具，然后在通讯簿对话框选项。

span.span: IsInitialAddressList corresponds to setting Show this address list first in the Addressing dialog box, which is available by clicking Tools, and then Options in the Address Book dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlRecipientSelectors NumberOfRecipientSelectors { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlRecipientSelectors get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlRecipientSelectors value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置常数，用于确定收件人的号码编辑的框 （每个相关联的命令按钮） 显示在选择姓名对话框。

span.span: Returns or sets a constant that determines the number of recipient edit boxes (each associated with a command button) displayed in the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 收件人编辑框中，可以输入收件人的姓名。

span.span: A recipient edit box allows you to enter recipient names.

para.span: 每个收件人编辑框相关联的命令按钮，在选择姓名对话框;收件人编辑框的命令按钮的示例包括收件人和抄送命令按钮。

span.span: Each recipient edit box is associated with a command button in the Select Names dialog box; examples of a command button for a recipient edit box are the To and Cc command buttons.

para.span: NumberOfRecipientSelectors的默认值是OlRecipientSelectors.olToCcBcc。

span.span: The default value of NumberOfRecipientSelectors is OlRecipientSelectors.olToCcBcc.

para.span: 如果将NumberOfRecipientSelectors设置为OlRecipientSelectors.olShowTo ，然后随后设置的文本或，则NumberOfRecipientSelectors将保持不变。

span.span: If you set NumberOfRecipientSelectors to OlRecipientSelectors.olShowTo and then subsequently set the text for or , the NumberOfRecipientSelectors will remain unchanged.

para.span: 如果将NumberOfRecipientSelectors设置为OlRecipientSelectors.olShowNone，则属性将被忽略。

span.span: If you set NumberOfRecipientSelectors to OlRecipientSelectors.olShowNone, then the property will be ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns the parent object of the object.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::Recipients ^ Recipients { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::Recipients ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::Recipients ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回集合对象，代表在选择姓名对话框中，所选定的收件人或设置一个Recipients集合对象，该对象代表在选择姓名对话框中显示的初始收件人。

span.span: Returns a collection object that represents the recipients selected in the Select Names dialog, or sets a Recipients collection object that represents the initial recipients to be displayed in the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 此属性指定一个Recipients集合对象，具有equal 的收件人总数在收件人、 抄送和密件抄送编辑框。

span.span: This property specifies a Recipients collection object that has a equal to the total number of recipients in the To, Cc, and Bcc edit boxes.

para.span: 如果不设置此属性时，才显示 选择姓名对话框中，由 SelectNamesDialog.Recipients 的 收件人 对象将具有 Recipients.Count 等于零。

span.span: If you do not set this property before displaying the Select Names dialog box, then the Recipients object represented by SelectNamesDialog.Recipients will have a Recipients.Count equal to zero.

para.span: 如果用户不会从选择姓名对话框中选择任何名称，然后单击确定， SelectNamesDialog.Recipients将返回一个Recipients集合对象recipients.count等于零。

span.span: If the user does not select any names from the Select Names dialog box and clicks OK, SelectNamesDialog.Recipients will return a Recipients collection object with Recipients.Count equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Session As NameSpace

summary.span: 返回对象的当前会话。

span.span: Returns the object for the current session.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: Session属性和可以交替使用方法来获取当前会话的NameSpace对象。

span.span: The Session property and the method can be used interchangeably to obtain the NameSpace object for the current session.

para.span: 这两个成员可以实现同一目的。

span.span: Both members serve the same purpose.

para.span: 例如，以下语句对执行相同的功能：

span.span: For example, the following pairs of statements perform the same function:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDefaultDisplayMode([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlDefaultSelectNamesDisplayMode defaultMode) runtime managed

param.name: defaultMode
param.span: 在确定 选择姓名对话框中的默认标题和按钮标签 OlDefaultSelectNamesDisplayMode 枚举常量。

span.span: A constant in the OlDefaultSelectNamesDisplayMode enumeration that determines the default caption and button labels for the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 设置选择名称对话框的默认显示模式，指定其标题和按钮标签。

span.span: Sets the default display mode for the Select Names dialog box, specifying its caption and button labels.

para.span: SetDefaultDisplayMode 是可选的。

span.span: SetDefaultDisplayMode is optional.

para.span: 如果在呼叫之前不调用SetDefaultDisplayMode ，默认显示模式将OlDefaultSelectNamesDisplayMode.olDefaultMail。

span.span: If you do not call SetDefaultDisplayMode before calling , the default display mode will be OlDefaultSelectNamesDisplayMode.olDefaultMail.

para.span: 若要设置显示模式为不同的值，应 显示 方法在调用之前调用 SetDefaultDisplayMode 。

span.span: To set the display mode to a different value, you should call SetDefaultDisplayMode before calling the Display method.

para.span: 利用此方法，可以显示 "选择名称"对话框，而无需使用资源文件将标题、 "收件人"标签、 "抄送"标签和 "密件抄送"标签的值本地化。

span.span: This method allows you to display the Select Names dialog box without using a resource file to localize the values for the caption, the To label, Cc label, and Bcc label.

para.span: 通过设置为您自己的值，可以覆盖内置行为， ， ，和。

span.span: You can override the built-in behavior by setting your own values for , , , and .

para.span: 您可以设置其他属性 (例如，设置到olRecipientSelectors.olToCc) 调用SetDefaultDisplayMode后。

span.span: You can set additional properties (for example, setting to olRecipientSelectors.olToCc) after calling SetDefaultDisplayMode.

para.span: 选择姓名对话框将观察后续设置。

span.span: The Select Names dialog box will observe the subsequent setting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowOnlyInitialAddressList { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 的判断由是唯一的AddressList下拉列表中的选择姓名对话框中的通讯簿。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that determines if the represented by is the only AddressList available in the drop-down list for Address Book in the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 此属性的默认值为 False ，表示显示所有地址列表。若要限制所指示的 InitialAddressList 地址簿的下拉列表，请将 ShowOnlyInitialAddressList 设置为 True 。

span.span: The default value of this property is False, meaning that all address lists are displayed. To restrict the drop-down list for Address Book to the one indicated by InitialAddressList, set ShowOnlyInitialAddressList to True.

para.span: 如果未设置InitialAddressList属性并将ShowOnlyInitialAddressList设置为True，然后使用AddressList 等于true，将仅在下拉列表中可用的地址列表通讯簿。

span.span: If you do not set the InitialAddressList property and then set ShowOnlyInitialAddressList to True, then the AddressList with equal to True will be the only address list available in the drop-down list for Address Book.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToLabel { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置为显示在选择姓名对话框的收件人命令按钮的文本字符串（C# 中的字符串）。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) for the text that appears on the To command button on the Select Names dialog box.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 若要提供的收件人编辑框的加速键，包括与号 (&) 在标签参数字符串作为访问键的字符前面的字符。

span.span: To provide an accelerator key for the recipient edit boxes, include an ampersand (&) character in the label argument string, immediately before the character that serves as the access key.

para.span: 例如，如果ToLabel是字符串"本地&与会者"，用户可以按 ALT + A 将焦点移到第一个收件人编辑框。

span.span: For example, if ToLabel is the string "Local &Attendees", users can press ALT+A to move the focus to the first recipient edit box.

para.span: 如果未设置ToLabel ，默认值将"收件人"的本地化的字符串。

span.span: If ToLabel is not set, the default value will be the localized string for "To".

para.span: 如果ToLabel设置为空字符串，则将显示收件人命令按钮的>。

span.span: If the ToLabel is set to an empty string, then the To command button shows ->.

para.span: 如果ToLabel属性包含超过 32 个字符 (包括与号 (&) 访问键)，将命令按钮中显示仅前 32 个字符。

span.span: If the ToLabel property contains more than 32 characters (including the ampersand (&) access key), only the first 32 characters will be displayed in the command button.
